article.title: SAIC Awarded $115 Million Subcontract to Support Tactical Biometrics Systems
article.author: Katie Packard
article.text: Science Applications International Corporation (SAIC) has been awarded a subcontract by Sensor Technologies Incorporated to support the U.S. Army Communications and Electronics Command by providing operations and user maintenance support to Tactical Biometrics Systems. SAIC's subcontract has a total contract value of more than $115 million if all options are exercised.
